SELECT nt.id AS id, nt.title AS title, nt.audit_time AS auditTime, nt.audit_status AS auditStatus, nt.audit_count AS auditCount, t.type_name AS typeName, nt.pub_time AS pubTime, nt.read_times AS readTimes, nt.comment_times AS commentTimes, nt.news_pic ASnewsPic, nc.context AS context, nt.reject_reason AS rejectReason, u1.username AS userName, u2.username AS auditName FROM news_title nt LEFT JOIN news_context nc ON nt.id = nc.title_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user u1 ON u1.id = nt.user_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user u2 ON u2.id = nt.audit_id LEFT JOIN news_type t ON t.id = nt.type_id where 1=1
AND nt.title like CONCAT('%',#{newsSearchDto.title},'%')
AND nt.type_id = #{newsSearchDto.typeId}
Order by nt.id
